Definition at line 152 of file eol_font.c.

void eol_font_draw_text ( char *  text,
eolInt  x,
eolInt  y,
eolVec3D  color,
eolFloat  alpha,
eolUint  size 
)

Renders text to screen using the default font of the specified size.

Parameters:
text the text to render. does nothing if NULL or string length is zero
x the x position (in pixels) to draw from (left).
y the y position (in pixels) to draw from (top).
color the (r,g,b) color to render the font in
alpha the translucency to render the font it
size which of the enumerated sizes to draw the font with

Definition at line 234 of file eol_font.c.

void eol_font_draw_text_block ( char *  text,
eolInt  x,
eolInt  y,
eolInt  w,
eolInt  h,
eolVec3D  color,
eolFloat  alpha,
eolInt  size 
)

Renders text to screen using the default font of the specified size.

Parameters:
text the text to render. does nothing if NULL or string length is zero
x the x position (in pixels) to draw from (left).
y the y position (in pixels) to draw from (top).
w the width (in pixels) to limit writing to
h the height (in pixels) to limit writing to. if 0, no limit applied
color the (r,g,b) color to render the font in
alpha the translucency to render the font it
size which of the enumerated sizes to draw the font with

Definition at line 397 of file eol_font.c.

void eol_font_draw_text_block_custom ( char *  text,
eolRect  block,
eolVec3D  color,
eolFloat  alpha,
eolFont *  font 
)

Renders text to screen using the default font of the specified size.

Parameters:
text the text to render. does nothing if NULL or string length is zero
block the bounding rectangle to limit drawing by. X and Y components are used for position if the H component is 0, no bottom limit is applied.
color the (r,g,b) color to render the font in
alpha the translucency to render the font it
font a pointer to the specific font to draw with

Definition at line 425 of file eol_font.c.

)

Renders text to screen using the default font of the specified size.

Parameters:
text the text to render. does nothing if NULL or string length is zero
x the x position (in pixels) to draw from (left).
y the y position (in pixels) to draw from (top).
color the (r,g,b) color to render the font in
alpha the translucency to render the font it
font a pointer to a specific font to draw with

Definition at line 262 of file eol_font.c.

void eol_font_draw_text_justify ( char *  text,
eolInt  x,
eolInt  y,
eolVec3D  color,
eolFloat  alpha,
eolUint  size,
eolUint  justify 
)

same as eol_font_draw_text, except it will be right justified.

Parameters:
x the x position (in pixels) to draw from (right).
y the y position (in pixels) to draw from (top).
color the (r,g,b) color to render the font in
alpha the translucency to render the font it
size which of the enumerated sizes to draw the font with
justify see enumerations for how it will be justified

Definition at line 138 of file eol_font.c.

eolRect eol_font_get_block_bounds ( char *  text,
eolInt  size,
eolUint  w,
eolUint  h 
)

returns the bounding rect ( in screen pixels ) of the text.

Parameters:
text the text to use in determining the size
size which default font to use for determining the size
w the width limit to apply to the block.
h the height limit to apply to the block.
Returns:
a rectangle that contains the bounding rectangle of the text. The x and y components will be empty. Note that the w and h provided may not be the actual bounds produced.

Definition at line 556 of file eol_font.c.

eolRect eol_font_get_block_bounds_custom ( char *  text,
eolFont *  font,
eolUint  w,
eolUint  h 
)

returns the bounding rect ( in screen pixels ) of the text.

Parameters:
text the text to use in determining the size
font pointer of the font to use in determining the size
w the width limit to apply to the block.
h the height limit to apply to the block.
Returns:
a rectangle that contains the bounding rectangle of the text. The x and y components will be empty. Note that the w and h provided may not be the actual bounds produced.
